page_content:
Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккею: обзор группового этапа








  Menu  Profile     English RussianPhygital Hockey Tournament Semifinalists Decided in Kazan11/23/2023Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккейThe  Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament has kicked off in Kazan. On the first day, six teams played their group stage matches. Tomorrow, November 24th, the tournament winner and the holder of the spot for the Games of the Future 2024 will be determined.Phygital hockey tests athletes' skills both in the hockey simulator and on the 3x3 hockey rink. The winner is determined by the total goals scored in both stages. Watch the video about the rules of the discipline.Group A1/33FRENZY 7:6 HC BUTYRKAIn the first match of the tournament, HC BUTYRKA faced off against team 3Frenzy, which finished third in the summer phygital hockey tournament in Kazan. At the start of the digital part, neither team could gain an advantage, but in the second period, 3Frenzy pulled ahead with a score of 6:3. On the ice, the score was only opened towards the end of the first period, with 3Frenzy's player Alexander Ovanov managing to score against the opposing team. In the second period, HC BUTYRKA launched three successful attacks in a few minutes, narrowing the gap to 6:7. However, the score remained unchanged until the end of the match – 3Frenzy secured their first victory of the tournament."We were focusing on ice hockey. We know the guys from 3Frenzy and their play style, so we adjusted to it to score. I like the tournament; the organization is great. But of course, we would have liked to win," shared Maxim Goncharenko, a player from HC BUTYRKA."It feels great to play, although it's a bit challenging. During our training, the rink was smaller, so playing here is tougher and unfamiliar. Plus, we have seven players in our team, while HC BUTYRKA has nine. A three-goal lead in the digital stage is good, but we aimed for more, at least 5-6. Nevertheless, the first goal by Sasha Ovanov inspired us; scoring first on the ice is important," shared Daniil Shabarov, a player from 3Frenzy.1/3HC BUTYRKA 4:3 NBSKThe match turned out to be tense and unpredictable. There was a lot of struggle on the ice, but it did not affect the scoring. NBSK had talked about focusing on the digital stage before the tournament, but they couldn't gain a significant advantage in the hockey simulator – ending up with a 2:1 lead in their favor. On the ice, the opponents also showed an equal game, in which HC BUTYRKA proved to be slightly more successful – 3:1 on the real rink and 4:3 in the match overall."We played against a team with many esports players. Our task in the digital stage was to keep the score tight, concede as few goals as possible, and then prove our advantage on the ice. Typically, teams with many console players have fewer who play hockey. So, we use our advantage – dominating on the rink. And this was evident to the spectators in both the first and the second game – HC BUTYRKA dominates on the ice. We proved that we are worthy of the final and victory. Let all the esports players fear us," shared Maxim Goncharenko, a player from HC BUTYRKA."The guys didn't do well in the digital stage, but we still started on the ice with a slight advantage. We made mistakes and were penalized for them, and it was hard to catch up after that. We gave it our all, and now we'll work on our mistakes to be in better shape for the next match, both in the digital and the physical stages," shared Andrey Maksimov, the captain of NBSK.1/3NBSK 13:5 3FRENZYIn the second match, NBSK was able to showcase their strength in the digital stage. The game was almost one-sided with a score of 6:1. The start of the physical stage went fairly well for 3Frenzy – the team employed a risky tactic with four outfield players and no goalie, managing to score two goals. However, the advantage then shifted back to NBSK, who skillfully bypassed defenders and scored into the empty net. The match ended with a score of 10:3. NBSK took first place in their group, while 3Frenzy will play in the match for fifth place."The match was tough, and it was difficult to play on the ice, but thanks to our esports players who gave us a good head start in the digital stage. Eventually, the opponent had to open up and pull their goalie, allowing us to score many in the empty net. 3Frenzy is a good team with excellent guys who play in the 3x3 league. Now, our main rival is HC BUTYRKA. We lost to them in the first match, and now we're hoping to meet them in the final," commented Andrey Maksimov, a player from NBSK."The opposing team played a tight game, trying to keep the puck. So, we brought out four outfield players to take the puck and capitalize on our opportunities. It was a risk, but the opponent shot four times into the empty net and scored every time," explained Alexander Zverev, a player from 3Frenzy.Group B1/3Liga Pro Team 14:5 ZaryaDIn the first period, the players of Liga Pro Team brought the score to 4:0. The players of the Kazan team tried to put up a fight, but the virtual ice encounter ended with a victory for Liga Pro Team - 11:4.The first goal of the physical stage was scored by Artur Zaripov, a player for ZaryaD and the son of three-time world champion Danis Zaripov. Liga Pro Team didn't allow their opponent to score any more goals. In the remaining time of the match, three unanswered goals flew into ZaryaD's net – 14:5 in favor of Liga Pro Team."From the very beginning, we were confident of victory, our task was to get a feel for the game, as we hadn't played 3x3 on a large rink before. By the middle of the second period, we were running out of energy, so we started to change every 30 seconds, like in real hockey. I had never played the hockey simulator before, but I managed to score. Still, I understood the game, and the guys shared some tips, so I was able to score a hat-trick in the digital stage," shared Pavel Zdunov, a player from Liga Pro Team."We failed the digital stage; the opponent was stronger. We were hoping to catch up on the ice. Overall, our strategy was to start fast to score the necessary number of goals, but a disallowed goal threw us off," commented Ruzal Galeev, a forward from ZaryaD.1/3ZaryaD 7:8 RFSO LokomotivIn the match for a playoff spot, ZaryaD performed excellently at the beginning of the digital stage – leading 4:1. But then, the third line of RFSO Lokomotiv helped to turn the tide of the game, finishing the stage on the virtual ice with a score of 5:4 in their favor.On the real rink, Artur Zaripov of team ZaryaD once again opened the scoring, but the railwaymen responded with two goals. With just 6 seconds left before the final siren, ZaryaD scored their seventh goal, but they couldn't bring the game to a tie and force a shootout. RFSO Lokomotiv won with a score of 8:7, and after two defeats, ZaryaD lost their chance to advance to the playoffs."We have a well-balanced team. The guys prepared for the hockey simulator advised us on how to play on the console, and we gave them tips on how to act on the ice. We prepared seriously and for a long time because we knew that Liga Pro Team has strong players in both the digital and physical stages. Since they won their first match, our task was to take the game from ZaryaD and then fight for the first place. Overall, the emotions were positive after every goal, both in the digital and physical parts. Although I haven’t managed to score on the console yet, I’ll make up for it," shared Daniil Surkanov, an athlete from RFSO Lokomotiv."Towards the end of the first period on the ice, we seemed to relax and made two mistakes that led to two goals. Probably, an excessive desire to score more and lead in the score played a role. The opponent was unknown to us; we had no idea about their style, so we played as best as we could," said Ruzal Galeev, a player from ZaryaD.1/3RFSO Lokomotiv 3:12 Liga Pro TeamThe match for first place in Group B started with a confident performance by Liga Pro Team on the virtual rink. The players managed to secure a nine-goal lead – 10:1. On the ice, the teams played to maintain the score. Liga Pro Team brought the match to a victory and took first place in the group."Honestly, it was tough. We prepared extensively, but there are still nuances we don't understand in the digital stage and on the rink. I can't say what will happen tomorrow, because all four teams that made it to the playoffs are quite strong, both on the console and on the ice. We will fight and show our best game," commented Yevgeny Bubyakin, a player from RFSO Lokomotiv."In the digital part, we played well and created a good lead. Our goal was to win and get some positive emotions, and the fact that we also came out of the group in first place is great. It doesn't matter who we meet in the semifinals, the main thing is to enjoy hockey and the game," said Anton Pervov, a player from Liga Pro Team.On November 24th, the semifinal matches will take place and the winner of the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament will be determined.Semi-finals 10:00 NBSK vs RFSO Lokomotiv 11:30 Liga Pro Team vs HC BUTYRKA* *The match start time is approximate. Games are conducted in a "followed by" format. Fifth place match 14:00 3FRENZY vs ZaryaDThe Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament is taking place at the Tatneft Arena from November 23 to 24 in Kazan. The total prize pool amounts to 1 million rubles.Watch the live stream of the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament on our website.also 12/2023Draw for the Games of the Future to Take Place at VDNH Games of the Future 11/2023Media accreditation process for the Games of the Future АккредитацияИгры БудущегоСМИ 11/2023Liga Pro Team Secures Spot at the Games of the Future Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023NBSK and Liga Pro Team to Face Off in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Tournament Final Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Tournament Semifinalists Decided in Kazan Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Teams Learn Their Group Stage Opponents Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Zaripov Team will compete in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey... фиджитал-хоккейИгры БудущегоЛига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккею 10/2023Liga Pro Team Crowned Champions of the Way of a Champion Phygital Basketball Tournament Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023International Phygital Basketball Teams Determined Group Stage Rivals Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Топ 10/2023Way of a Champion: Unveiling the Playoff Contenders in the Phygital Basketball  Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023Russian Phygital Basketball Players Step Onto the Way of a Champion Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Путь Чемпиона 10/2023Phygital Games 10: Basketball Players Discover Group Stage Opponents ЛучшееФиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10 9/2023Phygital Games 10: How to Get Your Ticket? Menu  Profile     English Russian Phygital Centers  


 Phygital Centers     Phygital Centers Phygital centers are sports venues of the new generation, where a unified and harmonious space is created for improving skills in both traditional and digital sports. These centers not only have sports grounds and areas for computer and console games, but also sections for virtual reality. Phygital centers offer a completely new approach to sports engagement.         Phygital centers are integrated into a unified ecosystem including computers equipped with special software, a website, and a mobile application for guests and professional athletes. These technological solutions allow participants of the phygital movement to book sports and gaming areas, participate in center events, and promptly track training sessions and competition results, both on sports grounds and in computer games.  Through their personal phygital profiles, they can receive statistical data on progress and levels of physical and digital activity.     THE PROJECT PROVIDES TWO TYPES OF PHYGITAL CENTERS     The first type is a semi-covered phygital center.  It includes open sports grounds (mini-football field, streetball court, workout zone), as well as indoor administrative and gaming areas (food court, computer room, areas for games consoles and virtual reality).         The second type is an indoor phygital center. It can be implemented in a typical format (all sports and gaming areas are located in a single indoor center) or in an individual format (specialized indoor centers such as a hockey rink, laser tag arena, skate park, etc.).         Phygital centers Phygital centers have the necessary infrastructure for conducting training sessions, team competitions, and educational courses to develop and popularize the phygital movement. The most active athletes and teams training in these centers will have a unique opportunity to be included in the list of participants for qualifying tournaments for Games of the Future.     Phygital centers are a focal point for active youth! page_content:
Media accreditation process for the Games of the Future








  Menu  Profile     English RussianMedia accreditation process for the Games of the Future11/28/2023АккредитацияИгры БудущегоСМИThe press accreditation process for the Games of the Future has started for journalists, bloggers, and influencers. The accreditation is required for covering the events that will take place in Kazan in February-March 2024.Accreditation began on November 20, 2023, and will continue until February 5, 2024.For international media representatives, accreditation must be completed by January 21, 2024, if they require an invitation letter for obtaining a Russian visa.You can apply for accreditation and fill out the required form in the "Press Center" section on our website. After completing the application, a link to a personal account, where you can track the status of your application, will be sent to the email address provided during the application process.Accreditation category1. For submitting applications for for multiple journalists from one media. On the website, you need to select the form "for media representatives with a list of several journalists from the publication". After verification of all data, a link to a personal account will be sent to the email, where you can independently enter all participants according to the selected quota.For individual completion by a journalist.For bloggers and influencers.(These categories will be considered individually according to the regulations established by the organizing committee).To apply for accreditation, influencers and journalists need to fill out all fields in the form, including the "additional information" section. You can familiarize yourself with the accreditation rules and conduct at the Games of the Future venues by following the links provided at the end of the form.If you have any questions regarding accreditation, visa support, customs procedures, accommodation in media hotels, arrivals and departures at official points of entry, equipment registration with RES, or transportation for media representatives in Kazan during the Games of the Future, please send your inquiries to: page_content:
Фиджитал Игры 10: баскетболисты узнали соперников группового этапа








  Menu  Profile     English RussianPhygital Games 10: Basketball Players Discover Group Stage Opponents10/4/2023ЛучшееФиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10ТопThe draw procedure for phygital basketball on the eve of the first competitive day of the tenth Phygital Games took place in Kazan. According to the results of the draw, teams of the tournament determined their rivals for the group stage. The “Way of a Champion”  phygital basketball tournament will take place at the Kazan Expo from October 5 to 8.According to the draw procedure, the pairs were distributed as follows*:Group A*:11:30 UNICS vs RFSO Lokomotiv12:35 RODINA MEDIA vs Liga Pro Team Group B*:13:40 U.R. vs UGRA. Reset14:45 SFU vs Liga Pro Team 47*Games are held in the followed by format.The competition consists of two stages. First, the teams play in a basketball simulator, then move to a real court, where they play 2x2 basketball. The scores of the two stages are summed up. In case of a tie, the winner is determined by a series of free throws.The “Way of a Champion” phygital basketball tournament is held within the framework of the tenth Phygital Games at the Kazan Expo, Kazan. The total prize fund amounts to 1.25 million rubles. Tickets can be purchased on the kassir.ru website.During the tenth Phygital Games the competition program featured five phygital disciplines: phygital basketball, phygital football, computer games CS:GO and Warface combined with laser tag and Mobile Legends: Bang Bang online tournament. Athletes from China, Spain, Turkey, Belarus, Azerbaijan and other countries will participate in the Games. Liga Pro Team - Победители турнира «Путь Чемпиона» по фиджитал-баскетболу








  Menu  Profile     English RussianLiga Pro Team Crowned Champions of the Way of a Champion Phygital Basketball Tournament10/8/2023Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетболLiga Pro TeamТопThe Way of the Champion phygital basketball tournament has finished in Kazan. Liga Pro Team triumphed as the competition’s winners, while team  U.R. secured second place, and RODINA MEDIA rounded out the top three.The competition consists of two stages. First, the teams play in a basketball simulator, then move to a real court, where they play 2x2 basketball. The scores of the two stages are summed up. In case of a tie, the winner is determined by a series of free throws.U.R. 23:32 Liga Pro TeamВ финальном поединке сошлись U.R. и Liga Pro Team. Во время цифрового поединка игроки U.R. оказали трехкратному чемпиону России по кибербаскетболу Михаилу Панченко (Liga Pro Team) достойное сопротивление, завершив виртуальный поединок с отставанием в одно очко – 14:15. Однако, матч на баскетбольном паркете прошел при абсолютном преимуществе Liga Pro Team, которым удалось одержать победу над соперником за три минуты. Матч закончился со счетом 23:32. Liga Pro Team стали обладателем трофея десятых Фиджитал Игр и выиграли квоту на Игры Будущего."I'm thrilled that I could help the team win the tournament. We swapped roles a bit today because I played terribly in the digital part, and we were saved by Shalva Shatashvili, who made some crucial shots. And he recently started playing the simulator. We'll prepare for the Games of the Future; the level of competition will be much higher. A lot of foreign players, whom I know well, and among them, very strong opponents, have already come to the international Phygital Games tournament," shared Mikhail Panchenko, a player from Liga Pro Team."We managed to compete on the console, but on the court, we couldn't provide a strong resistance. We were initially gearing up for a strong opponent. Well, all that's left is to congratulate our rivals; they fairly became the tournament winners. But we are delighted with our performance. It turned out to be a beautiful tournament," shared Vladislav Bechkov, a player from the U.R. team.1/5UNICS 27:31 RODINA MEDIAIn the match for third place, UNICS  and RODINA MEDIA faced off. The digital game was tight, with teams striving to quickly recover so the score wouldn't impact the physical part of the competition. The teams took to the LED court with a score of 15:13 in favor of the Kazan team. RODINA MEDIA basketball players Maxim Pogodin POGODA and Igor Sukhov-Mazin SUHAR immediately entered the fray, quickly making precise long-range shots to recover from their deficit and won the match with a score of 27:31. RODINA MEDIA concluded the tournament in third place."We performed well in the tournament, are pleased with the third place, but wanted the first. This was our first time at such an event. The Phygital Games are a cool show and a spectacular tournament. We really enjoyed it, the organization was superb, and we'd be happy to participate in similar competitions in the future," shared Maxim Pogodin, a player from the RODINA MEDIA team."Of course, we are dissatisfied. We couldn't deliver a commendable performance in front of our fans. In the match for third place, we should have secured the physical part, but our opponents made their shots. Perhaps, we couldn’t recover after an unsuccessful semifinal, couldn’t get into the right mindset. This is sport; we will make corrections for the next tournaments," said Ilya Rusakov, a player from UNICS. 1/5October 9th marks the kickoff of the International Phygital Basketball Tournament, taking place within the framework of the tenth Phygital Games at the Kazan Expo, Kazan. The Phygital Games had total prize money of 4 million rubles, of which 1,4 million rubles will go to the winners.Tickets can be purchased on the website kassir.ru.During the tenth Phygital Games the competition program featured five phygital disciplines: phygital basketball, phygital football, computer games CS:GO and Warface combined with laser tag and Mobile Legends: Bang Bang online tournament. Athletes from China, Spain, Turkey, Belarus, Azerbaijan and other countries will participate in the Games. The tenth-anniversary Phygital Games will be held in Kazan from October 5 to 22.also 12/2023Draw for the Games of the Future to Take Place at VDNH Games of the Future 11/2023Media accreditation process for the Games of the Future АккредитацияИгры БудущегоСМИ 11/2023Liga Pro Team Secures Spot at the Games of the Future Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023NBSK and Liga Pro Team to Face Off in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Tournament Final Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Tournament Semifinalists Decided in Kazan Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Teams Learn Their Group Stage Opponents Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Zaripov Team will compete in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey... фиджитал-хоккейИгры БудущегоЛига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккею 10/2023Liga Pro Team Crowned Champions of the Way of a Champion Phygital Basketball Tournament Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023International Phygital Basketball Teams Determined Group Stage Rivals Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Топ 10/2023Way of a Champion: Unveiling the Playoff Contenders in the Phygital Basketball  Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023Russian Phygital Basketball Players Step Onto the Way of a Champion Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Путь Чемпиона 10/2023Phygital Games 10: Basketball Players Discover Group Stage Opponents ЛучшееФиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10 9/2023Phygital Games 10: How to Get Your Ticket? metadata.title: Liga Pro Team - Победители турнира «Путь Чемпиона» по фиджитал-баскетболу
metadata.description: Завершился турнир «Путь Чемпиона» по фиджитал-баскетболу в Казани. Победителем соревнований стала команда Liga Pro Team, второе место завоевал коллектив U.R., тройку замкнула RODINA MEDIA. По правилам фиджитал-баскетбола команды должны сначала показать навыки игры в баскетбольном симуляторе, затем на паркете сыграть в баскетбол 2х2. Победитель определяется по сумме заброшенных мячей на двух этапах

page_content:
Осенью в Казани пройдут юбилейные Фиджитал Игры








  Menu  Profile     English RussianВ октябре пройдут десятые юбилейные Фиджитал Игры в Казани9/22/2023АнонсФиджитал Игры 10С 5 по 22 октября десятки спортсменов будут соревноваться в пяти фиджитал-дисциплинах за звание лучшего и возможность попасть на Игры Будущего 2024 в Казани.Дисциплины: фиджитал-баскетбол, фиджитал-футбол, компьютерные игры CS:GO/Warface + лазертаг, MLBBДесятые юбилейные Фиджитал Игры стартуют в Казани уже в октябре всего за 123 дня до главного спортивного соревнования 2024 «Игр Будущего». Во время турнира пройдет первый Чемпионат России по фиджитал-спорту «Путь Чемпиона» в дисциплинах фиджитал-баскетбол, фиджитал-футбол, фиджитал тактический бой, который включают компьютерные игры CS:GO и Warface в сочетании с лазертагом, и боевая арена: MLBB.На Игры приедут спортсмены из Китая, Испании, Турции, Беларуси, Азербайджана и других стран.Фиджитал-баскетбол: баскетбольный симулятор + баскетбол 2х2Юбилейные Фиджитал Игры откроют соревнования по фиджитал-баскетболу: «Путь Чемпиона» и Международный турнир. В цифровой части игроки сражаются в баскетбольный симулятор, следом, с набранными в виртуальной игре очками, выходят на баскетбольный паркет и определяют победителя там. Соревнования пройдут на МВЦ «Казань Экспо».Даты проведения турнира «Путь Чемпиона»: 5 и 6 октября – групповой этап, 7 октября – матчи 1/4 и 1/2 финала, 8 октября – финал и сражение за третье место. Билеты можно купить на сайте kassir.ru.Даты проведения Международного турнира: 9 и 10 октября – групповой этап, 11 октября – матчи 1/4 и 1/2 финала, 12 октября – финал и сражение за третье место. Билеты можно купить на сайте kassir.ru.Фиджитал-футбол: футбольный симулятор + футбол 5х5Соревнования также будет проходить в два этапа: «Путь Чемпиона» и Международный турнир. В столицу Республики Татарстан приедут спортсмены из Нигерии, Чили, Туниса, Тайланда, Азербайджана и Беларуси.В цифровой части игроки сражаются в футбольный симулятор, следом, с набранными в виртуальной игре очками, выходят на мини-футбольное поле и определяют победителя там. Соревнования пройдут в СК «Искандер».Даты проведения турнира «Путь Чемпиона»: 12 и 13 октября – групповой этап, 14 октября – матчи 1/4 и 1/2 финала, 15 октября – финал и сражение за третье место. Даты проведения Международного турнира: 18 и 19 октября – групповой этап, 20 октября – матчи 1/4 и 1/2 финала, 21 октября – финал и сражение за третье место.Боевая арена: MLBBТурнир по мобильной игре жанра «боевая арена» пройдет онлайн и проверит навыки спортсменов в игровой вселенной MLBB. Финальный состав участников определится 6 октября, когда пройдет заключительный этап квалификации.Даты проведения: с 12 по 15 октября – групповой этап, 19 и 20 октября – матчи 1/4 финала, 21 октября – матчи 1/2 финала, 22 октября – финал и сражение за третье место. Фиджитал тактический бой: CS:GO + лазертагТактический бой в формате фиджитал проверит навыки спортсменов как в игровой вселенной CS:GO, так и на площадке лазертага.18 октября стартуют соревнования по компьютерной игре CS:GO в сочетании с лазертагом. Четыре команды сразятся за звание сильнейшей и главный трофей Фиджитал Игры. Место проведения: МВЦ «Казань Экспо». Фиджитал-суперфинал пройдет на стадионе «Мирас».Во время группового этапа участники играют только в компьютерную игру — два гейма до 16 побед в каждом, в случае ничьей — два дополнительных периода по три раунда каждый. Во время плей-офф команды играют два гейма до 16 побед в каждом, в случае ничьей победитель матча определяется на арене лазертаг. Даты проведения: 18 и 19  октября – групповой этап, 20 октября – матчи 1/2 финала, 21 октября – финал и сражение за третье место. Билеты можно купить на сайте kassir.ru.22 октября пройдет  фиджитал-суперфинал (лазертаг) на стадионе «Мирас».Фиджитал тактический бой: Warface + лазертагТактический бой в формате фиджитал проверит навыки спортсменов как в игровой вселенной Warface, так и на площадке лазертага.18 октября стартуют соревнования по компьютерной игре Warface в сочетании с лазертагом. Четыре команды сразятся за звание сильнейшей и главный трофей Фиджитал Игры. Место проведения: МВЦ «Казань Экспо». Фиджитал-суперфинал пройдет на стадионе «Мирас».Во время группового этапа участники играют только в компьютерную игру — два гейма до 11 побед в каждом, в случае ничьей игра продолжается до преимущества одной команды в два раундов. Во время плей-офф команды играют два гейма до 11 побед в каждом, в случае ничьей победитель матча определяется на арене лазертаг. Даты проведения: 18 и 19  октября – групповой этап, 20 октября – матчи 1/2 финала, 21 октября – финал и сражение за третье место. Билеты можно купить на сайте kassir.ru.22 октября – фиджитал-суперфинал (лазертаг)  на стадионе «Мирас».also 12/2023На ВДНХ пройдет жеребьевка участников Игр Будущего Игры Будущего 12/2023Открытая page_content: Menu  Profile     English RussianOperation of radio electronic appliances at Phygital Games 109/28/2023Фиджитал Игры 10СМИLegal basis for the use of radio equipment (REAs) in the territory of the Russian Federation is established by the Law of the Russian Federation and normative legal acts on communications. According to the p.1 of the Article 24 of the Federal Law dated July 7, 2003 No 126-FZ On Communications, the right to use the radio frequency spectrum is provided by the elimination and assignment of radio channels and assignment of radio channels.In accordance with the requirements of the current legislation in the field of communications, the use of radio frequency spectrum without the appropriate authorization is not allowed. Assignment of a radio frequency or radio frequency channel is carried out by the Federal Service for Supervision in the Sphere of Communications, Information Technologies and Mass Communications (Roskomnadzor) taking into account the results of the examination of electromagnetic compatibility conducted by the authorized organization of the radio frequency service (FSUE "GRFC") in accordance with the Procedure for the examination of the possibility of using the declared radioelectronic means and their electromagnetic compatibility with the existing and planned for use radioelectronic systems.The executive organization of the International Multi-Sports Tournament "Games of the Future 2024" in Kazan - ANO Directorate of Sports and Social Projects, in cooperation with Roskomnadzor within the framework of the relevant joint agreements and adopted documents, carries out activities to manage the radio frequency spectrum and REAs on the territory of Kazan and in the adjacent areas of the Republic of Tatarstan during the preparation and holding at the Games.The Directorate shall take additional measures to restrict the use of REAs at the Games venues aimed at ensuring interference-free use of the radio frequency spectrum in the interests of the Games. In order to allow REAs to enter at the Games venues, each REAs user, with the exception of REAs specified in the List of REAs used without restrictions (hereinafter referred to as the List), shall be obliged to obtain a permit for the use of radio frequencies or radio frequency channels for civil REAs.During the period of events at the Games venues, Roskomnadzor employees will carry out radio control activities and identify REAs operating in violation.In order to process a radio frequency authorization, an application for the use of REAs at Phygital Games 10 must be submitted. The completed application form should be sent to radio@dspkazan.comAPPLICATION FOR THE USE OF REASTypes of REAsREAs include a wide range of radio transmitting devices for any purpose, the main types of which are listed below:In accordance with the Procedure of Examination for Possibility to Use Declared REAs and Their Electromagnetic Compatibility with Active and Planned REAs, Considering Materials and Taking Decisions on Assignment of Radio Frequencies and Radio Frequency Channels within Allocated Radio Frequency Bands, approved by the decision of the State Commission of Radio Frequencies dated 7 November 2016 No 16-39-01, the RFC obtaining procedure was obligatory for the following types of REAs intended for use at the Games:Wireless Fixed Link;Microwave Mobile Link;Fixed Satellite Link;Satellite News Gathering;Land Mobile Radio Service\Talk Back System\Handheld Radio Service;Cordless Camera;In Ear Monitor System;Interpretation Service System;Telemetry & Telecommand;Wireless Microphone;Wireless LAN;List of REAs used without restrictions*:Base stations of mobile network providers;Assistive listening devices (ALDs) for hearing impaired people;Car alarms;Customer premise equipment supporting Wi-Fi, including built-in Wi-Fi;Radio electronic devices supporting Bluetooth, including built-in Bluetooth;For all questions related to the use of REAs at the Games venues, please contact us at radio@dspkazan.com*There can be changes or updates to the list. The complete list will be soon available at the website.also 12/2023Draw for the Games of the Future to Take Place at VDNH Games of the Future 11/2023Media accreditation process for the Games of the Future АккредитацияИгры БудущегоСМИ 11/2023Liga Pro Team Secures Spot at the Games of the Future Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023NBSK and Liga Pro Team to Face Off in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Tournament Final Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Tournament Semifinalists Decided in Kazan Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Teams Learn Their Group Stage Opponents Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Zaripov Team will compete in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey... фиджитал-хоккейИгры БудущегоЛига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккею 10/2023Liga Pro Team Crowned Champions of the Way of a Champion Phygital Basketball Tournament Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023International Phygital Basketball Teams Determined Group Stage Rivals Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Топ 10/2023Way of a Champion: Unveiling the Playoff Contenders in the Phygital Basketball  Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023Russian Phygital Basketball Players Step Onto the Way of a Champion Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Путь Чемпиона 10/2023Phygital Games 10: Basketball Players Discover Group Stage Opponents ЛучшееФиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10 9/2023Phygital Games 10: How to Get Your Ticket? page_content:
NBSK и Liga Pro Team – финалисты турнира по фиджитал-хоккею в Казани








  Menu  Profile     English RussianNBSK and Liga Pro Team to Face Off in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Tournament Final11/24/2023Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккейThe finalists in Kazan for the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament have been determined. NBSK and RFSO Lokomotiv, Liga Pro Team and HC BUTYRKA battled it out for a spot in the final. The tournament winner and the holder of the spot for the Games of the Future 2024 will be decided tonight.Phygital hockey tests athletes' skills both in the hockey simulator and on the 3x3 hockey rink. The winner is determined by the total goals scored in both stages. Watch the video about the rules of the discipline.1/4NBSK 12:4 RFSO LokomotivTeam NBSK, before the start of the tournament, mentioned that they were focusing on the digital part. Their plan worked in the semifinals, giving Lokomotiv no chance – the opponents hit the ice with a score of 8:0. In the physical stage, NBSK played solidly and maintained their lead. The on-ice encounter ended in a 4:4 draw, with NBSK captain Andrey Maksimov and railroader Dmitry Bystrov each scoring twice."Our goal was to create a lead on the console and then comfortably play it out on the ice, which is what we ultimately did. We achieved a score of 8:0 in the digital stage, didn't let anything through, which is important, and then we didn't even aim to draw the game; we just played open hockey and enjoyed ourselves, and the plan worked. Going forward, we want to keep winning. We came here for victory, made it to the final, and it's all in our hands now. If we avoid mistakes, we'll leave as champions," shared his thoughts Vladislav Korotkiy, a hockey player from NBSK."Our task was to maintain the advantage in the physical part, we couldn't afford to lose on the ice. But we managed that. We conceded the fourth goal towards the end, so we didn't pull the goalie. Now we'll rest, train a bit more in the digital part, and compete for third place," said Daniil Surkanov, a player from RFSO Lokomotiv.1/4Liga Pro Team 14:7 HC BUTYRKAIn the digital stage, Liga Pro Team confirmed their status as tournament favorites – leading 10:2. The hockey players from BUTYRKA were only able to put up resistance in the second period, which ended in a 1:1 draw.The first period on the ice marked with six penalty shots, but none were converted! Goalkeepers Nikolay Shashkov (Liga Pro Team) and Yuri Sirotkin (BUTYRKA) played brilliantly. In total, there were 11 penalty shots in the match, with only three being successfully executed – all by BUTYRKA players. Going into the third period, BUTYRKA managed to reduce the score to six goals, but they couldn't catch up to their opponent. In the final part, Liga Pro Team played well in defense and accurately shot at the empty net. Liga Pro Team won with a score of 14:7."The opponent provoked us in the first period of the physical stage. Of course, we knew about their style since yesterday and prepared while conducting our analysis. But their players and ours was emotional. The victory was confident by the score, but we still have aspects to work on in the game. Overall, phygital hockey needs time for hockey players to improve in the digital part, so there aren't such eight-goal gaps when hitting the ice. Any hockey player can easily learn the simulator, especially if they played games in their childhood," shared Sergey Filippov, a player from Liga Pro Team."Again, we were up against a team with professional esports players. You see the audience's reaction in the stands; everyone is supporting us. After the first period, we made the score 10:4, then reduced the gap in the second and continued to push forward. The guys from NBSK in the stands were cheering for us; we know them well, they really wish us victory, and not just them. We react extremely emotionally to all our successes, not just to celebrate, but to create a show for the audience and to draw the opponent into the emotions," told Maxim Goncharenko, a hockey player from BUTYRKA.Tonight, on November 24th, the winner of the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament will be determined.3-rd place match19:30 RFSO Lokomotiv vs HC BUTYRKAFinals21:00 NBSK vs Liga Pro TeamThe Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament is taking place at the Tatneft Arena ice palace from November 23 to 24 in Kazan. page_content: Menu  Profile     English RussianPhygital Hockey Teams Learn Their Group Stage Opponents11/22/2023Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккейThe draw procedure for the  Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament on the eve of the first competitive day took place in Kazan. According to the results of the draw, teams of the tournament determined their rivals for the group stage. The phygital hockey tournament (hockey simulator + hockey 3v3) will be held at the Tatneft Arena from November 23 to 24.According to the draw procedure, the pairs were distributed as follows*:Group A*12:00 3FRENZY vs HC BUTYRKA15:00 HC BUTYRKA vs NBSK18:00 NBSK vs 3FRENZYGroup B*13:30 Liga Pro Team vs ZaryaD16:30 ZaryaD vs RFSO Lokomotiv19:30 RFSO Lokomotiv vs Liga Pro Team*Games are held in the followed by format.The phygital hockey competition consists of two stages. First, teams compete in a hockey simulator, then they move to the ice rink. The goals scored in both stages are summed up. In the event of a tie, the winner is determined in a shootout. Watch a video about the rules of phygital hockey.The Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament is taking place at the Tatneft Arena from November 23 to 24 in Kazan. Way of a Champion | Phygital Basketball | Final and 3rd Place Match








  Menu  Profile     English RussianBroadcast  - Phygital basketball - 10/8/2023 Way of a Champion | Phygital Basketball | Final and 3rd Place MatchТурнир «Путь Чемпиона» по фиджитал-баскетболу: баскетбольный симулятор + баскетбол 2х2. Сначала игроки покажут навыки в баскетбольном симуляторе, затем — выйдут на паркет и сыграют в баскетбол 2х2! Кто из команд пройдет «Путь Чемпиона», станет победителем и получит квоту на Игры Будущего 2024?Матч за третье место:18:00 UNICS vs RODINA MEDIAФинал:19:30 U.R. vs Liga Pro TeamThe “Way of a Champion” phygital basketball tournament is held within the framework of the tenth Phygital Games at the Kazan Expo, Kazan. Group stage: 5/6 October 2023; quarter-finals and semi-finals: 7 October 2023; final and battle for third place: 8 October 2023.The total prize fund amounts to 1.25 million rubles. Phygital tactical battle: mobile game Standoff 2 + Laser Tag. 3rd place decider + Finals. Phygital Games 6








  Menu  Profile     English RussianBroadcast  - Standoff 2 + Laser Tag - 5/31/2023 Phygital tactical battle: mobile game Standoff 2 + Laser Tag. 3rd place decider + Finals. Phygital Games 6 Phygital tactical battle: mobile game Standoff 2 + Laser tag. Tactical battle in the phygital format is designed to test the skills of athletes both in the mobile game Standoff 2 and in the physical arena Laser tag. Eight teams competed for the Phygital Flame, trophy of the sixth edition of the Phygital Games.Competitors:Bullet Force, Death or Glory, STREETEIGHT, Winstrike Team, Revial Gaming, SaiNts, iNCO GAMING, Team Coyotes.Group stage: 27/28 May 2023; quarter-finals and semi-finals: 30 May 2023; final and match for third place: 31 May 2023.    лазертагStandoff 2Other broadcasts To broadcasts matchmoments 8/2023Watch Standoff 2 + Laser Tag Group Stage Highlights лазертагStandoff 2Фиджитал Игры 6 Follow Games of the Future in social mediaGames of the Future Events Content News  VIDEO  Live Streams  About Games of the Future  Disciplines Information Press-center  Federation  Contacts  Volunteers  Partners  Phygital Centers   © 2022-2023 PHYGITAL English English Russian
